content.text:
# Golden Goblet Award for Best Live Action Short Film

The Golden Goblet Award for Best Live Action Short Film () is a highest prize awarded to short films in the live action category of short film competition at the Shanghai International Film Festival since 2017.
Award Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! Film !! Country
|-
| 2017 || Baka || Arvid Klapper
|-
| 2018 || White Sheep In The Car || Xu Min, Tan Diwen
|-
| 2019 || Nowhere To Put ||
|}
